description.title: Python as an external process to calculate the fibonacci series - validate on stdout
description.purpose: In this example testcase, the pysys process module is used to start a separate python process to calculate the first ten entries of the fibonacci series. The python process executes a script which prints to stdout the first ten entries of the series. The stdout and stderr of the process are written to the testcase output subdirectory and used in the testcase validation to determine that the correct values are calculated.
